message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $130.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for a better deal, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $125.
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit higher than that. I'd be willing to pay $115 for the product.
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $122.50.
I'm getting closer, but I'd like to get even closer to the price I'm comfortable with. I'd be willing to pay $112 for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $119.
I'm still a bit off from my target price. I'd be willing to pay $109 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than this, Bob. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $118.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $108. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider buying from John for $150.
